ComicInfo.Title: The Burnt Offering, Part 2: Lepers at the Table
ComicInfo.Summary: The world's Powers That Be — religious, corporate, political and superhuman — don't take kindly to a NEW Power That Is — Cable! Can Deadpool find a way to stop Cable from saving the world before Earth's Mightiest Heroes.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 15:17:11. [CVDB105843]
ComicInfo.Inker: Crystal Reid, Patrick Zircher, Rob Ross
ComicInfo.Characters: Anaconda, Beast, Cable, Cat, Constrictor, Cyclops, Deadpool, Domino, Emma Frost, G.W. Bridge, Hammer, Irene Merryweather, Mr. Fantastic, Nick Fury, Solo, Wolverine
ComicInfo.Locations: New York State, Providence, Xavier Institute
